about:
Software engineer with a can-do attitude. Graduated from **Department of CSE, BUET**. Love to solve algorithmic problems. During university days was actively involved with **Competitive Programming, Programming Contests**. Have taken part in several **ICPC, IUPC, NCPCs and won prizes as well**! 


 Technical Skills: 
 •Java, C++, Python, Go 
 •Spring Boot, Django, Django Rest Framework 
 •React.js with redux 
 •MySQL, Postgres, Cassandra 
 •AWS(EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, ECS Cluster, ECR, EKS) 
 •ELK Stack (Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana) with FileBeat 
 •Docker, Docker-Compose 
 •Kubernetes (EKS, GKE, Bare Metal K8S Cluster Deployment) 
 •CI/CD: Github Actions, Circle CI, SonarQube 
 •Algorithms, Data Structures 
 •Others: Git, Nginx, Apache Kafka, Redis, Celery
